turns.ai_line: Doctor, dis morning, after I chop di leftover rice wey I keep for fridge, my belle start to give me wahala. I dey feel pain for my stomach wella, even my body dey do me as if I wan purge. I even feel like to vomit sef. I dey stay for area wey e dey hot well well, food wey dem no keep well fit spoil sharp sharp. I no know wetin I fit do.

Doctor, I even try drink water and rest but e no help anything. E be like say the pain dey increase. I dey fear say the rice don spoil before I chop am. I no sure wetin I go do now. I no fit even stand up from where I dey, the pain too much.

Doctor, I beg, how you go fit help me? I don dey feel this pain since I chop the rice yesterday. E be like say I dey throw up every time and e come with serious pain for my belle. I no fit even hold anything for inside my belle. I no know if na the rice wey I chop na im cause am or something else. Wetin you think say fit cause am?
